name: The Room (itch) (Paranormal)
description:
You awake in a strange room surrounded by doors which one do you take do you know what lies behind this door sometimes we open doors that never should be opened 

objective is simple find the key before the darkness consumes you 

How To Play 

W-Move forward

S- Move Backwards

A&D-Move Left and Right

E-Opens Door

--Theme---

The Secret theme or the game jam was loot, when playing you collect keys and when collected enough you can change out your light source for a different aesthetic. 

This game Was Developed by one person for the Kjam a 72 hour game Jam so you can expect to find bugs
